trans-unit.source: Which additional options do you want to enable?
Which agent environments do you want to configure?

trans-unit.target: Chcete předem nakonfigurovat server Playwright MCP?

trans-unit.source: Create agent environment specific instruction files?
trans-unit.target: Chcete vytvořit soubory instrukcí specifické pro prostředí agenta?

trans-unit.source: Initialize MCP server configuration for detected agent environments.
trans-unit.target: Inicializujte konfiguraci serveru MCP pro detekovaná prostředí agentů.

trans-unit.source: Enter the path to the root of your workspace:
trans-unit.target: Zadejte cestu ke kořenovému adresáři pracovního prostoru:
Kořenová cesta pracovního prostoru je povinná.

trans-unit.source: API key for Dashboard MCP authentication. Required if Dashboard uses ApiKey auth mode. Can also be set via ASPIRE_MCP_API_KEY environment variable.
trans-unit.target: API key for Dashboard MCP authentication. Required if Dashboard uses ApiKey auth mode. Can also be set via ASPIRE_MCP_API_KEY environment variable.

trans-unit.source: The --api-key option can only be used when --dashboard-url is specified.
trans-unit.target: The --api-key option can only be used when --dashboard-url is specified.

trans-unit.source: URL to a standalone Aspire Dashboard's MCP endpoint (e.g., http://localhost:18888/mcp). Can also be set via ASPIRE_MCP_DASHBOARD_URL environment variable.
trans-unit.target: URL to a standalone Aspire Dashboard's MCP endpoint (e.g., http://localhost:18888/mcp). Can also be set via ASPIRE_MCP_DASHBOARD_URL environment variable.

trans-unit.source: Start the MCP (Model Context Protocol) server.
